errors.error_description: The installation steps are in the wrong order. The package is installed globally with pip before the virtual environment is created and activated.
correction_candidates: Move the `pip install ilamb` command to after the virtual environment is created and activated.
Run `pip install ilamb --user` instead of `pip install ilamb`.
Remove the virtual environment steps as they are optional.
Run `python -m venv venv --system-site-packages` to include globally installed packages.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `pip install ilamb` command to after the virtual environment is created and activated.
